text: Unlocking the Future: How Financial API Integration Supercharges Fintech Innovation <https://evincedev.com/blog/how-financial-api-integration-works-guide/>
is this actually applicable to HubSpot Development?

Yeah that's a good approach, just keep in mind that some HubSpotutk won't yet be associated to contacts, because the contacts might not have identified themselves yet through a form submission or something similar. <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/tracking_code_api/tracking_code_overview>

I mean if you really wanted to get technical you could use the forms submissions api: <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/get-submissions-for-a-form>

and collect all the submission events and then aggregate them manually yourself.

has anyone noticed a change in how quote templates in the past month or two? since there’s no easy way to capture the date of the signature, or include it like you do on other esignature tools, we had a field with just “today’s date” that we kept changing until it was signed. Something changed in April where fields on the quote stopped updating before it was signed (whereas previously it was just after). So now that’s broken. Curious if anyone else has noticed this, or if anyone else has an effective date solution?
Perfect, thanks. I'll dive into it.
of course! let me know if you run into any issues
